reviews.title: Uneven stay
reviews.text: The Hotel Zentral is located on Wiener Neustadt's central square. This is good and bad.

reviews.title: Great value.
reviews.text: The good: you can walk to restaurants, a bank, shops, cafes and to the train station (about 15 minutes away).

reviews.title: Quaint basic hotel, quaint old town.
reviews.text: The bad: party-goers in the square can keep you awake at night.
